greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number triangle (k-(k-1)*0^(n-k))*[k<=n].
comment: Row sums are n(n-1)/2+1 (essentially A000124). Diagonal sums are A114220. First difference triangle of A077028, when this is viewed as a number triangle.
.. apparently related to A208058. - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 22 2013
maple: if k < 0 or k > n then
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Nov 18 2005
